mapper.select: select r.r_num, p.program_name, r.r_reg_date, p.program_time, m2.user_name from program p join reservation r on p.program_id = r.program_id join member_info m1 on m1.user_id = r.user_id join member_info m2 on p.user_id = m2.user_id where r.user_id = #{userId} order by r.r_num

select r.r_num, p.program_name, r.r_reg_date, p.program_time, m.user_name from program p join reservation r on p.program_id = r.program_id join member_info m on m.user_id = r.user_id and m.user_id = r.user_id where r_reg_date = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by r.r_num
